page.title: 10James' Sunday at home
page.content: {Sunday}for us is usually a quiet family day. My sister and I get up at {9:30am}and after a small breakfast of {tea and toast}we play in one of the bedrooms for a while before getting changed. I read for a while or chat to Mum or Dad whilst Rachel writes or draws. After a light lunch of{soup, {sandwiches and fruit}I hurry down to my friend Peter's house where we play tennis in the back garden. At{5:30pm}I go home for my main meal which usually consists of{meat, potatoes,vegetables {and gravy.}We then set off for the Catholic Church - a modern building near Bryn Stanley. After arriving home from Church I get my things ready for school, check any homework is done then prepare for bed where I invariably read until I fall asleep. Sunday is a happy family day for us as we have time to do things together.
